tool_description: This is a movie website api built with python,  django and django rest framework
name: ProtonTv
title: ProtonTv

api_list.name: Thumbnails
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all the thumbnails of movies and series to the client
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://protontv.p.rapidapi.com/protontv.cc/api/all-thumbnails/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "protontv.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Series Detail
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the details of a singular series, eg series title, description, thumbnail, episode videos

api_list.name: All Series
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all the series in the database to the client

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "protontv.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Movie Detail
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all data relating to a single movie. It returns details like the movie name, the movie video,  description, thumbnail, etc

api_list.name: All Movies
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all the movies in the movies in the database to the client
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://protontv.p.rapidapi.com/protontv.cc/api/all-movies/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "protontv.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
